verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: says] [ARG1: he 's sending some of his top economic advisers to China for talks on the simmering trade tensions between the world 's two largest economies]
President Trump says he [V: 's] sending some of his top economic advisers to China for talks on the simmering trade tensions between the world 's two largest economies
